name: Collision Testimonials Shortcode
author: Todd Halfpenny

sections.description:
Displays testimonials managed by the Collision Testimonials plugin through the use of shortcodes. This allows the user to show testimonials within pages and posts without needing to alter any theme files.
”’REQUIRES THE SUPERB COLLISION TESTIMONIALS PLUGIN”’
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory collision-testimonials-shortcode and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the shortcut [testimonial id=x] to the page or post in the place where you’d like your testimonial to appear (where ‘x’ = the id of the testimonial to use. If you want a random testimonial to be used then no ‘id’ argument is needed (i.e. [testimonial]).
